org.postgresql.core

接口 ReplicationProtocol

  • 所有已知实现类:
    V3ReplicationProtocol

    public interface ReplicationProtocol

    Abstracts the protocol-specific details of physic and logic replication.

    With each connection open with replication options associate own instance ReplicationProtocol.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      PGReplicationStream startLogical(LogicalReplicationOptions options) 
      PGReplicationStream startPhysical(PhysicalReplicationOptions options) 

    • 方法详细资料

      • startLogical

        PGReplicationStream startLogical(LogicalReplicationOptions options)
                          throws SQLException
        参数:
        options - not null options for logical replication stream
        返回:
        not null stream instance from which available fetch wal logs that was decode by output plugin
        抛出:
        SQLException - on error

      • startPhysical

        PGReplicationStream startPhysical(PhysicalReplicationOptions options)
                           throws SQLException
        参数:
        options - not null options for physical replication stream
        返回:
        not null stream instance from which available fetch wal logs
        抛出:
        SQLException - on error
